content: For all the miracles of automated translation.... google translates translation of the vietnamese for C02.2 "Malignant neoplasm of ventral surface of tongue" is "The evil face of the abdomen of the tongue"

Hi Grahame
I meet you i the seminor today and tonight
I noticed that your server probably are having problems
when i using URL test.fhir.org/r3/Patient for create new patient. I add Header = Content-type and Body = JSon string. Your server response with Status 500 Internal Server Error

What tool are you using? In any case you should try to set the http header "Content-Type" to "application/fhir+json" and then set the body of your request (not a header called body) to contain the json string.
